verses.roman:
prabhura saundarya dekhi āra premodaya
'ei ta' sākṣāt kṛṣṇa' bhaṭṭera ha-ila niścaya

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saundarya—the beauty; dekhi—seeing; āra—also; prema-udaya—arousing of ecstatic love; ei—this; ta'-certainly; sākṣāt—directly; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhaṭṭera—of Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; ha-ila—was; niścaya—certainty.
translation: Seeing the beauty of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and the awakening of His ecstatic love, Vallabha Bhaṭṭa concluded, "Here is Lord Kṛṣṇa, without a doubt."
